title: Amnesia: Memories
description:
◆Notification for content price change

This is an announcement for download content price change for “Amnesia: Memories”.
From December 1st 2017, all added content prices will be updated to USD2.99
Thank you for your attention.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
The Standard Edition is available to download for free. 
The new scenario is available upon purchase of all main episodes in the Standard Edition, but is available right from the start in the Premium Edition.

It is the 1st of August. 
Upon awakening, you find yourself without any memories from before August 1st. Everything, from the sort of life you lived to the relationships you had, is a complete blank.
A young boy named Orion appears in front of you, revealing himself to be a spirit attached to your mind. Under Orion's guidance, you begin the struggle to regain your memories...

Blunt ∙ Earnest < Heart >
Shin (VA: Tetsuya Kakihara)
Your childhood friend and current boyfriend. He is only 18 years old, but has a very serious and cold demeanor that frequently causes conflicts with others his age. Oftentimes, he appears aloof and indifferent, but he is actually very affectionate and cares deeply for you. He is a senior in high school, and is currently preparing for university entrance exams. He is also Toma's childhood friend. 

Alluring ∙ Fascinating < Spade >
Ikki (VA: Kisho Taniyama)
Ikki has a unique condition that causes women to become enamored with him upon sight. He is 22 years old and is currently enrolled in a nearby university. Having given up on a genuine relationship, he lives the life of a playboy, indulging in the transient pleasures it brings. However, he becomes very close to you after he discovers his “eyes” have no effect on your emotions toward him. Despite his looks and popularity, Ikki is really a kind and sincere man. He is a good friend of Kent’s, a graduate student who attends the same university. 

Cool ∙ Logical < Clover >
Kent (VA: Akira Ishida)
A highly intelligent, 25-year-old mathematics graduate student, Kent sees the world from a purely objective point of view. He is normally very confident in his convictions and in the results of his relentless analysis of others; however, it seems as if he is unable to maintain the same composure when he is around you. His tendency to logically dissect every action makes him a difficult companion, especially among females.  He is a good friend of Ikki’s, who competes with him in solving overly complex math puzzles. 

Affectionate ∙ Intense < Diamond >
Toma (VA: Satoshi Hino)
Toma is a 20-year-old law student at the university you both attend. Being your oldest friend from childhood, he has naturally assumed the role of your big brother. Toma has always kept an eye on you from a close distance, and takes on the responsibility of caring for you after you collapse on the road outside of your apartment. His desire to protect you is extremely strong, to the point that his mental state can become unpredictable... He is also a childhood friend of Shin’s.

Mysterious ∙ Enigmatic < Joker >
Ukyo (VA: Kouki Miyata)
A strange young man who appears unexpectedly. He gives you mysterious warnings, and disappears again without explanation. Whether he wants to protect you or harm you is unclear.

Friend ∙ Protector
Orion (VA: Yumi Igarashi)
A spirit from a distant world. His outward appearance looks to the human eye as a 10-year-old boy. On his way to run a short errand in the human world, he crashes into you and becomes trapped inside your mind. He supports you in order to fulfill your mutual goal of regaining your memories.

How to Play 
After the opening movie, the title screen will be shown. To play a new game, select “NEW GAME.” To continue your current game, select “CONTINUE.” If you’d like to select another story, select “CHAPTER.”  After clearing the prologue, four different stories will become available.

summary: Amnesia: Memories
recentChanges: Server migrated
comments: It is an amazing game, fully voiced, amazing art, and a an enthralling story. It is fairly cheep all things concidered of how much got put into the game! Although, I do wish they put a trigger warning for certain routes though, lots of people could really get scared by it and younger folks may think it is normal and it warp their look on healthy relationships.

It's really good and all, but it tried to make me pay actual money for it. I don't have any money to pay on the game. It's B.s. if you ask me... They shouldn't do that if people have no money for games... I love the graphics and gameplay though. So, those deserve five stars.
Great games are expensive.... I Always liked Japanese visual novels, This one is perfect for Romance genre. But way too expensive, But It's okay.

Was so hyped to play this game but paying ~$3 for every chapter? No thanks. It's cool but frankly not that cool. The characters didn't really grip me enough in the prologue to warrant immediate unavoidable purchases to continue after like. 30 minutes of playing.

I wish I could give this app a better rating because I have heard such good things about it. However I can't because the app will not open. No matter how many times I try to reload it all I get is a black screen.

title: Amnesia
description:
Amnesia: Match a Dictator is a card matching memory game.  Upon launching the game all the cards are face down, on each turn flip two cards to try and find matching pairs.  Each card features an illustrated portrait of a dictator from across the globe in recent history such as Stalin, Putin, Smith, Mugabe, Batista, Castro, King Idris, Gaddafi, Somoza, Ortega, Hirohito, Il-sung, the GOP and Dems. Test your dictator knowledge and see if you can identify the portraits! Play it multiple times to sharpen your memory.

Although a lot of work went in to this game, particularly the illustrations, it is free to play.  However, if you would like to send a tip via PayPal, it would be greatly appreciate - ricardo@ambriente.com

title: Insomnia | Horror Game
description:
This is a survival horror game with mechanics point and click, this is not a person shooter.

Suffering from insomnia, and without being able to sleep, you find yourself locked in your room surrounded by darkness, where a creature tries to enter through you through the doors and closet, you will use your flashlight to prevent this creature from approaching you and being able to Survive until dawn.Play this wonderful but scary game through 5 nights, where each one will be more difficult than the other, listen carefully, keep your flashlight charged, and above all do not let the doors open.

Insomnia wakes you up at night and you must take care of a creature that lurks in the dark.Insomnia is an incredible game for lovers of suspense and terror.The game has excellent graphic quality, play with headphones and get into the game with realistic sounds.

This type of video games is great for gameplays.

- This game does not contain ads.

- For a better experience play with headphones

- This game contains scares, it is not suitable for people with heart problems

Remember this is part of the horror games.

comments: Absolutely a mad game! It really nails down the "insomnia" part. I love being stationary, i feel like a god flicking though the spots it kills you from. Especially at 5am. This game caters to inexperienced mobile players very well. Im on night 11 btw. Good things to add would be a short story plot and another map. But overall very well done.

Great graphics. I'm on the second night and just bacon stripped my underwear! That thing is creepy and fast. It would be better if you were able to leave the bed and explore the house. But after that scare I dont think I would anyway. To quote Shaggy from Scoobie Doo. "ZOINKS!!!"
You must play. I nearly peed my pants from jumpscare 😂 😂 😂 Honestly improvements would be-1) new map 2) torch lasts a slight longer or battery refill slight faster. Good game. Damn that's scary!
I absolutely love it but i gave 4 stars because the first time I played I peed myself. ☺😐
This game is so much fun! The jumscares scare me and im not usually scared easily!

'This guy's gonna make my life miserable, I can feel it...'
'Yet, I would give everything in the world to remain in his arms forever!'
💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖
💥 From the makers of Teen Love Story, here comes a super-thrilling role-playing “love story game” just for the greatest fans. Immerse yourself in an interactive story full of love, romance and dangerous affairs. Join our heroes and their adventures in drama school and learn what it takes to become a great actor. Find out your true personality! Who's gonna be your choice: a young, good looking actor and teacher or a protective school friend? Be careful 'cause one small step can easily take you into a “forbidden love” affair. Think about your decision, and remember that your choice will influence your feelings, your career and your future too! A shocking “visual novel game” for teenagers will keep you in suspense and despair while you wait for sequels! Choose your own adventure in 🎀Love Story Games: Teenage Drama🎀!
💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖
Get ready for the most powerful and heartbreaking romance:
💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖💥✨💖
✨LOVE OR LUST – Time to find out your true feelings!
✨Tempting and pretentious lover or protective school friend – think twice!
✨Boyfriends, besties, drama, school and everything that goes with it!
✨Impressive visuals, gripping love twists and characters' emotional struggles!
✨Choose the name for your cool teen character in our cool simulation games offline!
✨Choose your outfit and style!
✨Make your own love life choices and choose between two fabulously looking guys!
✨Change the story line of the "love triangle" you got yourself into see what you get in the end!
✨Only in 🎀Love Story Games: Teenage Drama🎀 - the best interactive story games for girls and guys alike!
SUPPORTED LANGUAGES: Polski, Türkçe, Español, Português, Deutsch, Français, Italiano, bahasa Indonesia, Srpski, Русский, عربى !
✨ The greatest love and friendship adventure in the most entertaining "interactive story games" ever!

💥 No one is immune to the temptation of forbidden love or drama. No matter how reasonable you are, there are times when your feelings take you on a journey that is bound to end in failure, but you simply can't let go and you just go with the flow. Our new romance story game presents you fantastic male characters that you can choose for your future boyfriends. Whether it will be your drama mentor who uses his tactics to blow you off your feet, or your high school friend who's always supportive of you – it's all up to you! But one thing is certain: you'll definitely fall in love with our free dating and flirting games for girls and otome love games!

💥 Unique 🎀Love Story Games: Teenage Drama🎀 will win your heart little by little as you follow the adventures of our heroes in their drama school, and you'll have a feeling that you're going through this inner struggle of your heroine! Only in our free “otome games offline”. Discover new episodes regularly, flirt with guys you like and live a true love story. Nowhere else will you find more compelling romantic games for girls. Therefore, download addicting “virtual love story game” ever, make wise choices on your way to future love and see what happens in the end. Real life “high school” games for girls completely FREE! New chapters and episodes added regularly!


Christmas countdown has started! Experience a true Christmas adventure with our free love story games! Dive into the magical worlds of fairies, virtual reality, vampires, mystery, witches and teenage drama, and celebrate the happiest holiday in the best way possible. If you have already set your Christmas live wallpaper and Christmas keyboard, now it's time to get cozy and play some of the best Christmas romance games ever! Wake up your Christmas spirit and enjoy our “Christmas games” with choices!
summary: Create your story of forbidden loves and true friendships in our brand new game!

comments: i really love this game, it's one of the best simulation games i've ever played! there is indeed a slight problem, namely too many advertisements, but that's not a problem, because this game is different from other games that have options that use many diamonds or coins. fashion choices are also free, with fun plots and great illustrations. i highly recommend this game for you!

I love this game so much I love how you can change the character when ever you want,yes you probably would have to watch an ad but in all the other live story games you cant change your character for free. There is so many different love interests in the game although when I was trying to go onto a new chapter it freezed and wouldnt let me play it but I emailed them and they sorted it out in less then a day. best story game ever I would hightly recommend

It's really great! I love how it doesn't use tickets or diamonds!! But the constant ads, are really annoying! But otherwise, it's reslly great! The animation is wonderful! Nothing like the other games I've played! I also love how different choices doesn't cost money or diamonds!!
This game is good but one thing is don't like about this game is it gets notifications when the new chapter is unlocked.... It's really annoying...
I really love the story so far. But my game gets stuck at ch 37😟. Please fix this 🙏

title: Hakuoki
description:
----------------------------------
Notification for content price change
----------------------------------
This is an announcement for download content price change for “Hakuoki”.
From December 1st 2017, all added content prices will be updated to USD2.99
Thank you for your attention.
====================================
“Hakuoki”, the otome game that gained popularity not only in Japan but in the whole world, is now available in English!
The whole story fully-voiced in Japanese by popular voice actors, and the beautiful illustrations are perfectly ported right from the PSP version! In addition to that, it features a new scenario and new illustrations specifically created for the original app.

The Standard Edition is available to download for free. The Prologue is playable for free and each chapter costs an additional US$3.99.
The new scenario is available upon purchase of all main episodes in the Normal Edition, but is available right from the start in the Premium Edition.

The Premium Edition, which includes all the scenarios, as well as the new one, is available at $27.99. (It costs $11.91 less than buying all the episodes using the Normal Edition)

-------------------------------

*Save data will be erased in case an update is performed.
*Save data from the Normal Edition and the Premium Edition are not transferable between each other.
*In case you update to the latest version of the game, your purchase information of paid scenarios will remain the same. If by any chance the paid content won’t open, please be aware that a restoration might be necessary.
*Wi-Fi connection environment is required to download this app.

[STORY]
It is the end of the Edo Era, and the 3rd year of the Bunkyu Era... 
The protagonist, Chizuru Yukimura, was raised in Edo and is daughter to a Rangaku scholar.
Having lost contact with her father in Kyoto, Chizuru decides to visit him. 
There, Chizuru witnesses a Shinsengumi soldier killing a bloodthirsty monster.
By strange happenstance, Chizuru finds herself connected to the Shinsengumi, and the assassins desperate to kill them.
As time progresses, Chizuru will discover their terrible secret...Furies.
Tortured by their own thoughts, the men of the Shinsengumi wield their blades in defense of their faith and ideals, in an era torn apart by chaos.
Hidden in the riots that defined the passing of the Edo period, a dark battle within the Shinsengumi begins: A battle that will never be recorded in the pages of history... 

[SMARTPHONE VERSION EXCLUSIVE SCENARIO “A Sweet Opinion”]
In February 1867, Chizuru is asked to attend a tea party on Kondo’s behalf. She accepts to go accompanied by the Shinsengumi warriors. What’s hidden behind that sudden invitation? What awaits her...? Find out by spending some sweet time with your favorite character!
*This scenario is mobile-exclusive! It’s fully voiced (Japanese) and includes six new illustrations.
*The scenario is available upon purchase of all main episodes.

[CAST]
Toshizo Hijikata（CV:Shin-ichiro Miki）/Souji Okita（CV:Showtaro Morikubo）/Hajime Saito（CV:Kohsuke Toriumi）/Heisuke Toudou（CV:Hiroyuki Yoshino）/Sanosuke Harada（CV:Kouji Yusa）/Isami Kondou（CV:Toru Okawa）/Keisuke Sanan（CV:Nobuo Tobita）/Shinpachi Nagakura（CV:Tomohiro Tsuboi）/Kodo Yukimura（CV:Ryugo Saito）/Chikage Kazama（CV:Kenjiro Tsuda）/etc
*Japanese Only.E9

recentChanges: Server migrated
comments: I love this game because it reminds me of my old RPG game. This game is great because it has CGs which represent certain scenes that can be replayed, full voice acting, and of course background musics. I love Saito and I choose him. His story, so far, is both heroic and dramatic. Hopefully, in the future, there will be a 'Hakuoki Fighting Game'. ^.^

I thought this game was absolutely stunning, the art, the music, attention to detail, there were very very few mistakes in translation which is amazing! I didn't get any of the official endings, but I did get the one with Kazama, and it was actually really cute? The story line was amazing, Everything was so beautifully done. Props to every single person who worked on this, they deserve it! Thanks for the amazing game! I wish the companies who worked on this the best of wishes! -Sincerely Beffey
Really nice looking game. Great story. But i refuse to pay $3 per chapter for it.

Not really free: pay per chapter. Around $15 for a story line or $23 for Premium app. Either way, too much for a 10 years old game port. Really nice controls. I like that it has an affection meter, but not sure how that works with purchases. Can't judge story, only the prologue I read, and it kind of failed at showcasing the characters. It was obviously thought as a full game were you slowly get to know them and find their routes, not one where you immediately have to choose which route to buy.

I absolutely love this and i do understand that you need to make money but having to pay for every chapter is really upsetting. Is it not possible to have to pay for certain things and get the chapters for free instead? Genuinely curious here. The visuals are stunnig and its well made from the one chapter that i saw but. ya. I feel like it would be better if you guys didnt make the app free if u have to pay for everything else. Its a little misleading and disappointing when u do find out.

title: Eyes: Scary Thriller - Creepy Horror Game
description:
You break into the mansion at night.
It’s huge and built like a maze.
You're trying to escape, but the monster is after you!
The chase begins.

RUN!!

Escape ghosts and endure evil jumpscare in this free yet terrifying survival horror game.
 
Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this free atmospheric horror game. But no matter what, never play alone in the dark.
 
As you explore decaying rooms in search of riches, an eerie wail shudders through the dead air and fills your heart with horror. And the chase begins.

Lights flicker, books rattle on their shelves and the scary TV bursts into static.
 
Seven reasons to download Eyes – The Horror Game right now:
 
→ Multiple scary monsters and beasts to choose from – or create your own demon with custom visuals and audio
→ Multiple levels to unlock: an old haunted house, an abandoned hospital, and a desolated school. More added all the time!
→ Multiple gameplay modes to endure
→ Use mystical Eye runes to see through the monster’s twisted vision and try to survive its grudge
→ Consult a hand-drawn map to plan your next move
→ Compete with fellow adventurers on the global leaderboards or play offline
→ The perfect horor & thriller game: tense gameplay, a scary beast, sudden jumpscare, and a chilling atmosphere
 
Will you escape the mansion? Download Eyes – The Horror Game today for free!

comments: I loved playing this. It seems this game has multiple locations you can visit and play them at different levels; there are 4 levels. The 1st location is free. While the other locations are not. You need to buy the rest of the locations. In-game coins make this easy. The one thing that i did not like is it is not a completely offline game. Some of the perks needs internet for you to use it. I don't know if it was just mine. The hand drawn maps was only for the 1st location.

I really like this game! The only issue I have is that every time I play, a pop-up appears that says that the game requires Google Play Games, I think it's called, whenever I click on one of the chapters. I don't have any trouble playing the game itself, it's the Google Play Games pop-up that's annoying me. You should be able to play a free game without being harassed about downloading a separate app when you can still play the game without it.

It's really thrilling and scary and so cool at the same time well the first time I play I thought the girl has a body and the head icon is the only one to be there but when I saw her I died well it's still COOL love this game so all of them are just head and there's a dog too and more challenging options this gotta be the best game cool really cool and the girl with only a head was really unexpected 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 the best game i love horror games too well this one is thrilling
100% great just that when you make a ghost can you add an option to save the creation and can you make the characters/maps all play able for free I wouldn't want to spend money (not an fake review

One of the Best scary apps in android..but u guys have to do some new challenges or new maps i mean bigger maps ..like if u got 20/20 money u go outside and u keep playing to get a car to run away or somthing like that

title: Insomnia Returns | Horror Game
description:
You suffer from insomnia and wake up in a terrifying night, but something more terrifying is with you ... Is it a demon? A monster? , or it could be a scary memory that comes back to your head for a long time .. ..

You suffer from insomnia and you start sleeping less and less at night and more during the day, but you feel a presence of horror at night, it may be that your mind is disturbed or real, all you know is that you are scared to death and that your best friend is light.

Insomnia is one of the best horror games on Google Play, discover the incredible sequel to the first part of this terrifying horror game.

Hear the terrifying breaths and hide in the closet, something evil is coming for you! 😫 Don't let the demon get too close or it will be too late!
Pay attention to the terrifying sounds that sound in the house, it seems that you are not alone ...

Immersive and terrifying graphics, realistic and disturbing sounds, are the elements that make this game one of the best horror games on Google Play.

Game Features:

➮ Easy to understand

➮ Feeling of terror at all times

➮ Amazing game mechanics inspired by Insomnia Horror Game part 1

➮ Terrify the sensation with Audio 8D

➮ Creepy graphics

➮ JumpScare very scary.

➮ creepy demon demon 💀

Remember!

Insomnia is a horror game and is not suitable for people with heart problems or easy to scare people.

title: Henri's Secret
description:
Story and Gameplay :

Incarnate Lyla in this Visual Novel whose last high school year will be full of surprises, mysteries to solve, friendship and most importantly love.
This year, a new student has arrived at Lyla's high school: Henri , who has the look and the attitude of a student who is first in his class. 
She's beautiful and popular, he's reserved and almost unpleasant. Nevertheless, the attraction makes its way to these two high schoolers who couldn't be more opposite.
Experience with Lyla this romance rich in events, love, friendship, humor, mystery, investigation and... Superstars!
The mystery of Henri hides a true secret... But... Will love withstand this secret? 

Contact-us :

Questions? Suggestions? Need technical support? Contact us anytime at support@beemoov.com.

Story and Gameplay :

Incarnate Lyla in this Visual Novel whose last high school year will be full of surprises, mysteries to solve, friendship and most importantly love.
This year, a new student has arrived at Lyla's high school: Henri , who has the look and the attitude of a student who is first in his class.
She's beautiful and popular, he's reserved and almost unpleasant. Nevertheless, the attraction makes its way to these two high schoolers who couldn't be more opposite.
Experience with Lyla this romance rich in events, love, friendship, humor, mystery, investigation and... Superstars!
The mystery of Henri hides a true secret... But... Will love withstand this secret?

Contact-us :

Questions? Suggestions? Need technical support? Contact us anytime at support@beemoov.com.
summary: Incarnate Lyla in this game to live a beautiful and mysterious romance!

title: The Letter - Best Scary Horror Visual Novel Game
description:
[This game features English language only! Translations to follow.]

ABOUT

The Letter is an interactive, horror/drama visual novel inspired by classic Asian horror films. Told through an immersive branching narrative, the game puts the players into the shoes of seven characters as they find themselves falling prey to a vicious curse plaguing the Ermengarde Mansion for centuries. 

In this game, your choices will shape and drive the story forward: will you mend a relationship on the verge of collapse, or will you let it fall apart? Will you risk saving them, despite the consequences, or leave them to die a gruesome death? The fate of all the characters is in your hands.

FEATURES

* Non-chronological storytelling with seven chapters, spanning over 700,000 words. Expect a lot of reading!
* Romance, friendship and drama; apart from horror, this game puts heavy emphasis on relationships and character development.
* Seven playable characters with varying personality and approach to difficult situations.
* Countless butterfly effects; your choices heavily affect the story.
* Full English Voice Acting.
* Animated backgrounds, CGs and sprites.
* Beautifully painted art style.
* Original soundtrack, with opening, ending and true ending theme songs.
* Quick-Time Events.
* First Chapter Completely Free! No ads whatsoever!

comments: I really like the game but there is a MAJOR PROBLEM: All. The. Talking. One time, I got so tired of it all, that I just kept of skipping all the talking, just tapping the device for five minutes straight, and I STILL didn't get through all the diologue for that one scene. Delete a few lines from the game, because this is enough to take two stars off my rating.

Its definitely, without a doubt, a 10/10. I first discovered this game when I was 9, I was very fond of diary games at the time, and I stumbled upon The Letter's spinoff and fell absolutely in LOVE with Little Becky's and Ash's story (which is probably why I ship them later on) when I finished the whole game, I found out about The Letter from the ad that they have in the game, and I decided to check it out. Since I was only 9, I waited for 4 years and installed it! Bought it, loved it!

Part 2 please! (Or at least make games similar to this masterpiece!) I have finished the game for like, alot of times already! Experimenting on different endings and working on the characters' relationship with each other. 💓 I'm so glad that I have achieved a good end when I first played it tho. 💓 And I've seriously had mixed emotions when I finished playing it's true ending. 💓 All the characters are great! The girls are my favorite, specially Rebecca 💓

It's pretty good, but the best but I don't regret buying it. Not very scary unless you're paying it alone in the dark at midnight. It gets a bit boring at parts and there's a glitch with kylie in two of the scenes where she's 'possessed' but the pictures are switched which ruins the effect a bit. I just started my second playthrough and i live how different everything is when you make different choices. I look forward to getting everything.

Like the game. Only played the first chapter, because I don't have money to pay for this game. From what I did see: The writing has some issues. Story has pacing issues, and characters have consistency issues. A character will forget who they are for a second to move the story forward at times. Game is okay, but have to pay around 10 bucks to play this game. Not sure I blame them for this, monetization for a visual novel seems tough. That being said, I give this format 3 stars.

title: Yandere Boyfriend - Otome Simulation Chat Story
description:
☆★ FREE 7 EPISODES with 3 Phone Calls + 3 Voice Messages + 3 ASMR★☆

This is the 7th school that I transferred to the whole of my high school life. 
I want to make a good friend however someone seemed too interested in me.
The guy who is popular in this high school likes me?

Don′t talk about and don't think others when you are with me. Sweetie.

But, he is too obsessed with me. Can I get out of him?

★ IT IS UPDATED VIDEO ADS FOR ENJOYING EACH EPISODE FOR FREE ★ 
Available to enjoy 1 episode after 5 watches. (It can't be the permanent collection.)
※ The free episode will be locked after 24 hours.
※ 5 Video ads are available to watch every 6 hours.


1. Supported for English.
Also available listen to the full voice from voice artist!

2. FULL VOICE & Call & Voice message & ASMR
If you buy a lifetime whole episodes, available to hear FULL VOICE 
and bonus voice from the voice actor.
- The main character 'Leo' calls you every episode.
- Received a Voice message.
- Available to listen ASMR.

3. Translate English Completed.
The whole episode was translated. Enjoy it!

[Notice]
- Please check the internet environment before receiving the episode.
- If you have a problem, please capture the screen and send it to bookpalcomics2@gmail.com.

[Information on access rights]
- Phone (required) : Required when using device authentication and ID reading services.
- Storage (required) : You need to save the work resources (image and voice file) and view the work.

comments: The game is really good, translations can be a bit iffy but if you have half a braincell you can figure out what they are trying to say. However, they recently implemented a ticket system where you can "complete tasks" to be able to read ahead. DO NOT DO THEM THEY DONT WORK. I legit signed up for Disney+ and got nothing in game. Its a waste of your time, money and effort.

The art is amazing and love the voice acting. But I played very little... I uninstalled it because in the beginning of the story Leo was always sending me ads. I know you need to make money, but it was pathetic that everytime he would send me something. Still the biggest reason I uninstalled it was because the button for "All Eps" was in front of text. I dislike the layout of the game, it's poorly made... and I could not take out the button in front of the chat. Sorry but I didn't like it...

I just finished episode 13 and I'm really excited! This story makes me so curious and it always leaves me wanting more. And that's what I call a good story! To be honest, I haven't paid anything to play this game, I didn't have to. I can always just watch adds. I usually get mildly infuriated when i see a grammar issue but this time, I'm really calm. As long as I get what they are trying to say it doesn't matter! This game legit is fantastic. I'm looking forward to what is in stoke for me :)

So awesome! I really love Leo's voice 😝 I'm addicted 😳 too bad I can't purchase all episodes. 😔😢 Nonetheless, Leo is INSANE! He's words are poetic at times, like yoh, he is mysterious and sexy (not gonna lie),. The way he looks at you, stares!!! 💙 😍💗 I really love this game and absolutely well done to you for making this game! It's a HIT!!! 💙 He makes me feel REALLY SPECIAL!!! 💝😇🌹🤗💘❣️💞💋

How can you like a game when you can't even play it... The starting eps were really fun and I really wanted to continue but as I'm broke and can't purchase the eps with money had to get the free tickets but then I realized to get em I have to complete some annoying survey that doesn't offer me ticket even after completing em... I really really do want to play it but unfortunately I can't....im really upset (╥﹏╥)

title: Mayday Memory: CHOICE SF Otome
description:
[Plot Summary]

Year of 2099, a time where people can buy and sell memories.
[Vigil], the PI office that never sleeps, gets a big case!
Play as the office's youngest member ""Dell"", who lost her memories and try to solve the case!

The sharp-tongued main character “Dell,”
The superstar with a screw loose “Ain, ”
The reckless colleague “Syd,”
The stingy freelancer “Hansol,”
The idiot chief “Jeff,”
And the world's laziest rabbit robot “Mode”!
The kind of weird, and somewhat lacking,
but strangely lovable 6 main characters with explosive chemistry!

To you who will complete our precious memories,
Mayday, Mayday!


[Game Introduction]

The sixth game from LucyDream, the creators of 'Dangerous Fellows'! Mayday Memory!
A new interactive female-oriented story game filled with unique problems and twists.
Experience the special stories unique to LucyDream games, that sets it apart from other visual novels!
Memory loss, mystery, comedy, detectives, cyber punk, shocking plot twists, memory loss, drama, and of course romance!
An expansive story that lets you be who you wanna be!


[Game Features]

:: Away with only romance! Comedy, Suspense, Action, experience it all!
Interactive otome visual novel, the game that tops it all!
:: No side-kicks! The character you choose is the real main character!
Touching character stories and beautiful ending illustrations are waiting for you!
:: Complete missions and collect materials.
If you ask Mode... Mode might help you make gifts for your chosen character?!
:: Give him gifts! Maybe... You get to see a different side of him…???
:: Memories and a diary that get neatly saved as you progress the episode!!

■ Notice about phone permissions
The following services will need additional permissions when using the app.
[Optional Permissions]
- Storage (Pictures, Media, Files) : For saving illustrations on your device
[Retracting Permissions]
Options > Privacy > Choose permission > Choose app > Allow or Deny Permission

recentChanges: - Fixed an issue where it was impossible to progress the tutorial
comments: Most important thing: I got thru the entire story and unlocked 2/3 (almost 3/3, I have 50 Affection left for Hansol 😖) special endings ABSOLUTELY FREE. MayMem's not a game that requires money, though if you're not a grinder and/or don't like watching ads for free stuff, it may take you longer to progress. It's got an interesting story, MC is hilarious, and there's a good balance of serious drama and banter with your potential love interests. Very fun otome!

Very creative and well written story. All i can say is: This story game 100% better than 2 other lucydream game : dangerous fellows and heavenly. ( i just finished 3 of them and this story is the best splendid.) Better than in movies drama. I would say this storyline is better than most of K-drama or comedy we have now out there. A shame this is not a drama series. It would be very entertaining if this story is remake in drama form of presentation. I definitely recccomend ths story for all.

Amazing story, well written characters and good ost and gameplay is good. Loved everything about this game. i have played lots of otome game but not a single mobile otome made me cry. This one did. Lucy Dream did an amzing job in this one. Hope we get more games with such an well written plot and character like this. Good job Lucy dream.

I really enjoyed playing this game! I like the length of the chapters. Just enough for a study break. The energy recharge upgrade rates in the shop are also fairly reasonable, and I like that it doesn't take much to farm gems as well. What I enjoyed the most was the ART. It's so good! I'll reread chapters just to look at the art again. The banter between the characters is also a major plus! Took me a while to get the purpose of missions tho.

This is an interesting game. It has all what I like about otome game. The characters are not too shallow and the plot is centered in mysteries (which I love). Edit: this game is great. I would recommend it to those who seeks better quality otome games and those who love a well-thought plots and nice character developments.

title: Love Story Games: Blog of Secrets
description:
❣️ Fresh from the Webelinx oven!!! A brand new love story packed with romance, secrets, intrigue and tough choices! Fasten your seat belts and start your new adventure now! ❣️

This is your chance to peek into the life of a famous blogger and find out what it feels like to be an online celebrity. But there's a catch! No one actually knows who you are in real life! Will your secrets catch up with you? And how will you deal with all the challenges on your path to success? That part is entirely up to you!

Use all the amazing features this love story game has to offer:

💘 You can choose your character's name!
💘 Have fun with even more customizing options!
💘 Enjoy the beautiful graphics and unexpected plot twists!
💘 Decide who'll be the one to steal your heart away!
💘 It's your choice how you'll deal with your enemies!
💘 Experience a story filled with drama and suspense!

title: Moonlight Lovers Ivan : Vampire / Dating Sim
description:
Discover a French otome game in English with Moonlight Lovers! A series of interactive stories (choice game) in a dark, mysterious and dangerous universe…

Discover a story of love, vampires, romance and betrayal in this narrative game!

The best part? You can play the Moonlight Lovers visual novel for free.

Will your heart succumb to darkness?

Each story is divided into chapters. In each episode, you will need to make different choices to personalize your interactive story. You can play all the choice games of the Moonlight Lovers series for free and in any order. Each character has their own love story, their own adventure and their own mysteries… Your romance can end in three different ways in this choice game: it’s up to you to uncover the mysteries of the manor and the vampires that live there! 

🌑STORY 🌑

“I inherited this immense manor from my parents. I had no knowledge of its existence. Barely having set foot in this place, I already felt watched and observed… What is going on here?”

Ivan is the youngest vampire at the Manor. Constantly pulled in two directions, he hasn’t accepted his condition as a creature of the night. Ivan isn’t able to leave his past behind him and he is consumed by nostalgia and guilt. He will have to learn how to control himself so that he doesn’t endanger the people he cares for.

Will the bond that unites you to Ivan be strong enough to liberate him… and protect you?

🌑 GAMEPLAY 🌑 

Choice game: Moonlight Lovers is an interactive story. In each episode, you will be able to make a multitude of choices each have a consequence on your story. Choose your destiny! 
Three different endings can be unlocked depending on your choices. Will you experience the best possible ending?
Romance: Six vampires, each with a different story, intrigue and personality. Six intense love stories.
Visual novel: A visual adventure with numerous illustrations to collect!

🌑 STRONG POINTS 🌑

A French otome game in English.
A complete narrative adventure.
Three different endings, depending on your choices during the story.
An intense romance with each vampire. 
A dark and mature universe, soaked with mystery and intrigue.

Follow Moonlight Lovers on our social network pages:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MoonlightLoversUS 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/beemoov/


🌑 ABOUT BEEMOOV 🌑

Beemoov is an international, free web and mobile games production company. Beemoov develops visual novels, otome games and fashion games such as My Candy Love, Eldarya, Like a Fashionista and Henri’s Secret. The teams are committed to offer players original and unforgettable experiences. “Moonlight Lovers: Vladimir” is a free otome game where it is possible to obtain purchased bonuses.

🌑 CONTACT US 🌑

Questions? Suggestions? Need technical support? Contact us at: support@beemoov.com

comments: This game is based on an AP system but it's terrible. You get 500 AP which appears 2 be higher then some other games, but it's actually less. Every tap on the screen u lose 20 AP, basically u only get +25 sentences. This also is skimped cause the game always starts you about 2 - 3 sentences backwards. U can get more AP from 1 Ad for 60 AP which is only +3 taps. Also, the navigation sux, if u watch the ad vid, you get locked into a replenish screen and u have 2 close the game an reopen 2 continue

For people who are giving this game a 1 star: I'm sure you've never played an otome game before because then you would've know that you get 500 coins everyday and you can get 60 coins every 5 hours. The coins aren't the problem at all. The story line is great. It's a great game for people who has patience. If you get through the 2nd chapter, then you'll start to really like the game too

Honestly I REALLY love the story. Its easily one of the best stories ive gotten into BUT... 1. You go thru the AP WAY too fast...if you want to have enough AP to do chunks of the story at a time? Well... 2. The game makes it impossible from a free standpoint. I had the idea of trying to stock up on the 'daily' 500 AP bonus, plus the 60 ap per video but GUESS WHAT- EVERY TIME I LOG BACK IN, THE AP HAS RESET. I end right back with 500 AP. You lose your 'daily' AP EVERY DAY if you DONT USE IT.

The story seems like it COULD be interesting, however it takes a long time to get there with the ap system that is put into place. Its pretty annoying to only be able to collect a few aps a day, and play 1 ad for 60 aps when every sentence is 20 aps! That and you can't just log in and collect your aps for later use so that you can have a longer play time. They just overlap. So say you collect 500 one day and dont use it and then log in thinking you'll have 1000 aps you will still only have 500!
I really love the story. He is almost like me the youngest, can't control himself, always say sorry... I loved the story more than Vladimir's but, I really want to play Ethan's story so badly!

title: Horror
description:
Norman White, professor and doctor of medicine, conducted an experiment with his colleague Adrian Dolaren, during which the latter disappeared without a trace. Norman was accused of his loss, but due to lack of evidence he was released. After some time, Dr. White begins to work in a psychiatric hospital, but at one point he goes missing. After his disappearance in the hospital, patients begin to disappear. No one can understand how this happens. Closed wards are found empty in the morning, and the bars on the windows and the locks on the doors are intact.
John Williams is a patient at a psychiatric hospital. He does not remember how he got there, he recently had amnesia. One night, he noticed that something strange was happening. The hospital became unnaturally quiet, and the night still does not end. John decides to get out of his house and find out what is happening.
In the game you have to find a way out into the normal world, solving various puzzles along the way, avoiding meeting with monsters, and also finding out the true intentions of the crazy Dr. White.
All characters in this game are fictional, all matches are random.

comments: It is a nice game but the reason I gave it 3 stars is that after a certain point I didn't lnow where to go and I explored both the buildings but I was not able to find anything I hope it gets better.....

Has this game have any ending? IDK, but , When I enterded room number 999 . I saw there was a puzzle and a hint. But, I don't know even what will be the answer of the puzzle ? so, I enterded the room number 419 and some eyes started to appear on the wall and there was a sound started to come from the door and the whole screen became black and there is writen that "GAME OVER" THIS GAME WAS TOO CHALENGING. I love this game.

Didn't get anything of the story, never died once except the soft lock room. The monster appeared thrice and vanished within seconds. What did I just waste my time on. Would not recommend, super boring, the story is not at all detailed, only tried it because of the low size of the game, but now I know why because the game has absolutely nothing in it, Just keeping walking left to right.

It started out interesting with the notes but got pretty boring when you couldn't speed up the walking back and forth. The one time the creature jumps out was good tho! So 3 stars, I would have gave it 4 if you could walk faster and 5 stars if u had some eerie background music and more room design. Otherwise not too bad 🙃

Great, game offline no ads but, one thing is it is alot of back and forth from room to room. Including floor to floor you really have to look tap around the screen. Another is I wish it was more to the story it's a very great plot but, I feel it deserves a little more entanglement if you know but great game👌

title: My Candy Love - Episode / Otome game
description:
My Candy Love is a dating/romance game (dating sim) where the scenario adapts entirely to your choices for a unique love story! Join an episode-based love game that combines three otome games and a community of more than 9 million players!
New episodes are released regularly. Collect the outfits and illustrations, participate in events and live a passionate story with your Crush!
Choose the universe you prefer to live a unique romance: at Sweet Amoris High School, at Anteros Academy University or directly in the working world of Love Life!

STORY

Choose to live your story in high school, at university or in the working world. More than 60 episodes can be played in all, with a new episode available each month!

In My Candy Love - High School Life, live the life of a high school student at Sweet Amoris High. You’ll meet dashing and unique boys. Will you fall for the bad boy, the class representative or the geek?

In University Life, jungle between university and your job at the Cosy Bear Café! Maybe you’ll see the love of your life there… Are you rather forbidden romance or childhood love?

In Love Life, fulfill yourself in your work as well as your relationship! Who will you choose to go on your adventure with? The modern art professor or the charming lawyer?

GAMEPLAY

♥ Fill your love gauge

Make the right choices in the dialogue to fill your Crush’s Lov’o’Meter! The affection meter is the base of all otome games and dating sims. Get to know the characters by spending time with them during the episodes. Learn what they like and make your choices in consequence.

♥ Illustrations
Unlock magnificent illustrations of marking moments in your story! Several illustrations for each episode!

♥ Personalize your avatar
Hundreds of clothes for a unique style! Dress your avatar with the clothes obtained in the episodes, in the shop or during special events!

♥ Events
Several times a year, participate in the colorful events. Play exclusive mini-games and unlock original outfits and illustrations!

STRONG POINTS

✓ Three otome games in one application.
✓ All your choices have an influence on your adventure and relationship.
✓ A dating sim complete with many characters that you can flirt with and with whom you can develop a real love story!
✓ A multitude of intrigues.
✓ A new episode each month.
✓ Regular events all year long.

About Beemoov

Beemoov is a free web and mobile episode games production company.
Beemoov develops visual novels, otome games and fashion games such as My Candy Love, Eldarya, Like a Fashionista and Henri’s Secret. The teams are committed to offer players original and unforgettable experiences. My Candy Love is a free otome game where it is possible to obtain purchased bonuses.

Contact Us

Questions? Suggestions? Need technical support? Contact us at: support@beemoov.com

recentChanges:
For Halloween, you will be investigating the mysterious disappearance of Chania, the famous psychic.

📓 SPECIAL INVESTIGATION 📓
Interrogate the local witnesses and find clues that will allow you to know more about the five suspects. Between searches, you can win the Trustworthy Lady and Outcast Madam outfits!

🕯️ ACCUSATION 🕯️
Once your investigation is complete, you can identify the guilty party. If you accuse the right person, you will receive a special illustration!
comments: The characters and the storyline is good, my only complains are the AP and the coins. It's too difficult to get some AP and coins. My suggestion is you should give the players a daily log in bonus like 100 AP or 50 coins per day. 20 AP per day is not enough and the mini games isn't even that helpful. If you don't improve this game you will lost alot of players. You should mind that not everyone is willing to spend some real money in games. If you improve the game, I will give you 5 stars.
This game would've been so much better if it wasn't for how little coins and PA we get every day. Increase the number of daily rewards. Make it at least 50 coins and 100PA per day.

I remember enjoying this game when I played it when I was 13 or something. But the action points got progressively more annoying... Back then, when there was only highschool life, you needed action points to move locations. Which was sometimes annoying, because you would end up searching for the person for 5 days sometimes. Now, even PROGRESSING THE DIALOGUE USES ACTION POINTS, which is really annoying because you lose track quite quickly throughout the days WASN'T GREAT BEFORE, NOT WORTH IT NOW

It's a good game and very entertaining. But characters randomly pop up to drain action points which is annoying when we get so few action points to begin with. If there was a way to watch ads for action points I would really appreciate it because I cant afford to buy a bunch of action points

I have played for years and the story and characters are amazing, however like many other players it does upset me that we only get 20 ap per day making it really difficult to motivate myself to get on everyday and play for just a bit, also I like others do not have that much money to spend on games, I really love this game and I know that I can log in everyday and not play and keep getting ap but it is really tiring to have to wait to really enjoy it. Please take this into consideration

title: Detention
description:
[ About Detention ]
Detention is an unique atmospheric horror game heavily influenced by Taiwanese/East Asian culture (Taoism and Buddhism references) based on the 1960s Taiwan under martial law. 

With simple point and click mechanism, the player control characters who venture into the school beset by hostile supernatural events to uncover stories behind the haunted place. 

Incorporated religious elements based in Taiwanese/Chinese culture and mythology, the game provided players with unique graphics and gaming experience.

* Detention is the IndieCade 2017 award-winning title developed by Red Candle Games.

[ Features ]
- Story-driven atmospheric horror game.
- Unique Taiwanese/East Asian cultural references.
- Original soundtrack fusing Electronic, Lo-Fi, and Rock with traditional Asian instruments.
- Appealing graphics and sound inspired by Taiwanese literature, film and music in the 1960s-70s.
- Single player 2D side-scroller with point and click mechanism.
- Multiple language support. (including English, Chinese, Japanese and Korean)


[ Press Review ]
"A heavy dollop of Silent Hill, it’s a horror game unlike anything else I’ve played." 
- Adam Smith, Rock, Paper, Shotgun

"Every facet of Detention moves in one harmonious lockstep towards an unavoidable tragedy, drowning out the world around you." 
- Destiny Maddox, Rely On Horror

"The art direction, atmosphere, and audio design are all very well done. It has a polish you don’t often see in adventures by small teams." 
- Andy Kelly, PC Gamer


[ More about the Developer ]
Follow Red Candle Games to receive updates about the studio's future titles.

Facebook | https://m.facebook.com/redcandlegames/
Twitter | https://m.twitter.com/redcandlegames/
Instagram | https://m.instagram.com/redcandlegames/

comments: It starts off good. Scary, and decent albeit easy puzzles. My other gripes in the beginning are it's easy to avoid enemies, there aren't enough of them, and the lack of enemy variety. After a certain point, the game just becomes an interactive movie with a few mostly weak puzzles thrown in. If you aren't into the story at this point, it's tedious. The story is, however, creatively and artistically expressed in many details. It's a good game if you enjoy stories over gameplay.

It was like I was in it every time the game switched characters and like wowwww the ending just hit me different that any other horror game it just I had no words to Express the way I felt so please if you have more games like this keep it up your doing a awesome job at making these games thank you for the experience .

Intriguing and intense! Starts off as a seemingly paranormal horror that turns into something more psychological. Amazing graphics and creative use of scenes and storylines. I appreciated the Tawainese history and spiritual side. Puzzles are a mix of straightforward to complex. It's a very heavy game (Maybe borderline depressing to some) I finished with the true ending and it was emotional. The breath-holding double tap parts are inconsistent and awkward, but that's all. Overall, well done!
A true work of art, at first its a bit scary then its a visual novel. It made me cry, with the music, the visuals. I hope they keep creating more games. ♡~

I love the game, really the cutscenes, the gameplay and the Storyline is a masterpiece, the game deserve more than 5 stars, I love that they give you more than one ending, I really recommend to download this game.

title: Mystic Messenger
description: You stumbled upon an app called "Mystic Messenger" and downloaded it. Once you opened it up the app is  connected to a mystic group chat with attractive guys. You are asked to join their secret party planning association called and the story begins...
descriptionHTML: You stumbled upon an app called "Mystic Messenger" and downloaded it. Once you opened it up the app is  connected to a mystic group chat with attractive guys. You are asked to join their secret party planning association called and the story begins...
summary: Female oriented dating messenger game. Call/text/chat systems are provided.
recentChanges:
- Replacement of app icon
- Event update: Special title illustrations appearing in a random order
comments: I love this game to pieces, I've played it for two years now and I've bought both of the merchandaise packages because of how much I love it. Absolutely worth it. It's an amazing game especially considering it's free, for me it just really makes me feel so invested in the story that I want to support the creators and unlock everything there is to achieve in the game lol. Loveable characters and great storylines, totally recommended. ♡

After trying this and a few other otomes, i can safely say this is my favourite. Very beginner friendly. The characters are also extremely lovable, and every individual route is a new experience that allows you to see the different sides of every character, not just your LI, and I think that's brilliant. In any case, this is an easy 5 stars for me. The devs are really nice about game issues too, giving us hourglasses and all. Luv u

Mystic Messenger will always be more than just a love game. The concept is to fall in love but it's like each character you pursue you literally save them from what they were going through. Anyway, this game holds a lot of meaning and you sympathize/empathize with what each character goes through. The amount of times I've legit cried so hard is hard to count. I'll always love MM and Sujin Ri thank you for not giving up on making this game, without it idk what I'd do. 💕 Cheritz ❤.

It is so great that i got emotionally involved with the storyline. Love their characters especially seven and jumin. And i also love saeran for being so precious. The graphics are nice. And the gameplay is actually great except for the real time chatrooms (especially the 3-4 a.m. ones). There is nothing to complain about because overall this game is a gem. (will you add new DLCs tho?)

One of my favourite games. Have been playing and replaying since 2016. Though on coming back to it recently, for some reason none of the videos will load. So miss the beginning and ending Q^Q don't know if it's a problem localised or more people having it. Hope either way it resolves itself soon. Thank you so much for this game 💜

title: Ikemen Vampire Otome Games
description:
Play the top free otome romance game in English!
A chance encounter in the Louvre leads you into a mansion full of some of the greatest men from history! But there's a twist...they’re vampires! And they're out for blood. Your blood.

Can you survive a month living under the same roof as these deadly handsome men? Or will you give into temptation?
					
Ikemen Vampire: Temptation in the Dark is the newest addition CYBIRD’s hit Ikemen Series otome games! If you enjoyed Midnight Cinderella, Ikemen Sengoku, and Ikemen Revolution, get ready for another romantic phenomenon that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Get lost in a mystic, tender and thrilling interactive romance novel with love interests that include none other than Mozart, Isaac Newton, and Shakespeare! Ready to make history?

Enjoy a vibrant, exciting romance complete with engaging music, gorgeous illustrations, and character voices! Receive 5 free Chapter Tickets each day to progress through the story! Free to download!  Play now and find your very own vampire otome love!

■Date Characters voiced by some of Japan's most popular Voice Actors!
Napoleon Bonaparte (Voice: Nobunaga Shimazaki)
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (Voice: Toshiyuki Toyonaga)
Leonardo Da Vinci (Voice: Kenjiro Tsuda)
Arthur Conan Doyle (Voice: Ryohei Kimura)
Vincent Van Gogh (Voice: Yoshihiko Aramaki)
Theodorus Van Gogh (Voice: Hisanori Sato)
Osamu Dazai (Voice: Taku Yashiro)
Isaac Newton (Voice: Shouta Aoi)
Jean D'Arc (Voice: Toshiyuki Someya)
William Shakespeare (Voice: Daisuke Hirakawa)
Comte de Saint-Germain (Voice: Kazuma Horie)
Sebastian (Voice: Syuta Morishima)

■Collect Exclusive Cards!
Cards have gorgeous anime style illustrations featuring scenes from the main story, events, and more! Set your favorite Card as your Home background and he will speak to you! Cards include voiced lines so you can hear his enchanting voice! Depending on the card rarity, he might even get close and personal with you.

■Dress Up with Cute Attire for your Avatar and His
Experience more interactive otome gameplay with the in-game avatars.
Choose from gorgeous Cinderella dresses, beautiful room backgrounds and gardens, and cute accessories to become a vampire princess that would tempt any guy! Freely rotate your avatar and decorations to make a room that matches your tastes! Limited edition attire pieces are constantly being added so that you can always stay up to date with the latest trends. Characters from the story are also available as avatars! Dress up your love interest for the perfect date night together.

■Shape Your Story through the Choices You Make!
In Ikemen Vampire, there are multiple endings available for each guy depending on the choices you make in the game. If you get enough points you might even receive a special epilogue with your one true love! Along the way, unlock special side stories told from his perspective to learn all about his true feelings. Which happy ending awaits you? Play to find out!

■Enjoy In-Game Story Events for a New Experience with Your Guy!
Ikemen Vampire holds many free Story Events that require no Chapter Tickets to continue reading! Play to experience exciting mini stories outside of the main story. Get into new situations with your favorite guys, and clear endings to get bonus items and attire pieces!
Team up with your friends to clear the events faster and get every event ending!

*1・・・Free to Play （In-Game Payable Content Available）

(Recommended device specifications: 1.3 GB free space, 4 GB RAM/memory)

recentChanges:
Thank you for playing Ikémen Vampire. It is I, your butler, Sebastian.

Behold, a list of what's included in this update:

comments: I love this game! But i rated this 4 stars because, this early morning and even until now, i can't get in to the game and it keeps on loading then a pop up will appear and say that there's error and bad connection. I refreshed our wifi, even my phone, as well as turning on and off my phone but it's still the same. I haven't played for a whole day and this has never happened. I don't want to uninstall this because I spent money on this game 😭

I love this game! I know people in other reviews wrote that you can only play one chapter a day, but you bond better with the character that way, also there are five parts to each chapter so chill there's plenty to read. At checkpoints, if u dont get the premium item you still get to read the same story, the only difference is that you dont get to reread it. This app is very well done and the character arcs are flawless. I cant wait for Comte's route to be released!

Overall, it's a great otome game with a unique setting and genuinely interesting characters. My only complaint is that, for some reason, after watching an ad to earn a diamond, the amount of diamonds I have doesn't go up. I'm new to the game, so I don't have many diamonds, but after watching more than 5 ads (today), I've only gotten three diamonds in total from them. It's an odd bug that's pretty annoying, at the least I hope it isn't recurring.

I just started reading & I like the storyline thus far, however it would be much more enjoyable if the chapters were longer, since we only get to read one chapter a day. As with another otome; Honey magazine, you get 3 tickets but it's 1 ticket per chapter & it regenerates 1 ticket every 4 hours. Also bothers me when it flashes back to a previous scene using up slides that could be used to progress the story or start each chapter with the last 8-10 slides of the ending of the previous chapter.

This game is amazing. The only downside is the pricing and how hard it is to earn currency. The prices are really high and it's proven to be difficult to earn coins and diamonds. And ONE diamond per add is really low. Other than that, the story is great and the music is too, it's really enjoyable.

comments: Hmmmm... This was Different! Vampires, & "stories??" I didn't like the story between every game segment - too much. It was ok for something different, I guess - wouldn't want a steady diet of it, though! Thanx, jan p. Well, when I ended the game, turns out, I LOVED IT!! Very unusual & ended Too abruptly, but it was good. Was looking for a wedding, but it wasn't meant to be, I guess!

I LOVE this game, I just DON'T like being TIMED when I'm trying to find the item's. I've got (epilepsy,& bad eyesight). And i DON'T like using the stars just to continue the game, it's kind of annoying. If you have to give me the stars, give me LOT'S of the star's. I also don't like doing the level's over,& over again. THAT'S (REALLY ANNOYING). And as it goes further, it get's harder. I'm not fond of that eiather. Other than that, i have no other problem with this game. 👍😤😊💗

Ok, so I'm not sure which app was thr original, but there is some MAJOR plagerism going on between this app and one other that I recently installed and played and uninstalled because it was eh. The entire storyline, quotes, dialogue, was WORD FOR WORD. Idk if this app was the one plagerizing or it was the other app, but there's something fishy going on. The only difference was that this app had mini games and the other app had you choose the clothes.

So i finally find a story and game app all rolled into one that doesn't require gems to do fun stuff and I'm loving it but then i get to chapter two and boom it doesn't open any more. They say I've got no "internet connection" even if I'm using wifi. I just gave two stars cuz i love the concept of the app. You guys should probably do a rain check or people are gonna loose interest.

It is almost impossible to get to the story. You are doing more games then reading. I don't like that at all. The reason I don't like it is because ( Yoou start to read the chapter and when it gets good you have to play the game. ) Who ever thought about this game didn't put much thought into it.

title: Guide for Amnesia: Rebirth
description:
Amnesia: Rebirth, a new descent into the darkness from the creators of the iconic Amnesia series. A tragic journey to overcome devastation and despair and explore the limits of human resilience.

About this game

You can't exhale. Creatures are only a few inches away. Its sole purpose-to feed your fears. And you crouch in the dark, try to stop your fear from growing, and try to silence what is in you.

"I know you. I know what you can do."

Amnesia: In Rebirth, you are Tasi Trianon and wake up deep in the Algerian desert. The days have passed. Where were you What did you do Where are the others? Follow your journey and put together your shattered pieces of the past It's your only chance to survive the pathetic horror that threatens to devour you.

"Don't offend or scare yourself."

Time is against you. Step into Tashi's shoes and guide her through her personal horror and pain. While struggling to get through the desolate landscape, you also struggle with your own hopes, fears, and bitter regrets. Still, you need to keep going step by step, knowing that if you fail, you lose everything.

*First person story horror experience
*Explore the environment and reveal its history.
*Overcome the puzzles that get in your way.
*Carefully manage limited resources, both physically and mentally.
*Encounter terrifying creatures and use your wisdom and understanding of the world to escape them.

Description of mature content
The developer describes the content as follows:

The game includes strong horror themes, gussets (corpses, etc.), depictions of violence, non-sexual nudity, and strong words.

---- DISCLAIMER ----
This is an unofficial application for Amnesia: Rebirth Horror Game 2020. This application is not affiliated in any way with Developer. The Name, Brand and the Assets are all property of Developer or their respectful owner.

title: City of Love: Paris
description:
YOUR CHOICES, YOUR STORY
Dive into an interactive drama where romance, mystery and the Parisian lifestyle combine! Meet colorful characters, build relationships and unravel a mystery shrouding a dangerous secret…

YOU are the heroine of your own story and YOU choose how you want to explore the iconic City of Love: discover exquisitely beautiful Parisian locations, make new friends and get to know them better through a wide range of fun activities. Meet, date and flirt with different love interests. And who knows? You might just find true love!

A NEW BEGINNING
You’re interviewing for a job at City of Love, Paris' most prestigious lifestyle magazine and brainchild of Raphael Laurent, a handsome entrepreneur and publishing guru extraordinaire. But is this the real reason Raphael has invited you to Paris?

Welcome to City of Love: Paris! 
• BE the heroine of YOUR own interactive drama. The choices you make shape your social relationships and influence the story. There are no wrong choices, but some choices you make will have greater consequences than others. Make each choice count!

• DISCOVER Paris, the eternal City of Love and the perfect setting for your new life. Explore the delights of France and enjoy the French way of life.

• EXPLORE countless iconic locations such as Notre-Dame cathedral, Montmartre, Le Louvre, the Champs-Elysées, the quays of the river Seine and much more!

• IMMERSE yourself in each story scene, episode after episode, with the help of beautiful backgrounds and lifelike animations.

• UNRAVEL the mystery shrouding an old, dangerous secret and investigate multiple locations including the Luxembourg Gardens, the Pantheon and the Place Vendôme.

• BECOME engrossed in an intriguing plot with unexpected twists and turns in every episode. What thrilling ending will your choices lead you to?

• MEET colorful and sexy characters and build close relationships with your best matches. True friend or sworn enemy? Rival or helpful ally? The choice is all yours!

• SHARE unforgettable moments with your close circle of friends and collect these precious souvenirs in original artworks that can be unlocked in every episode.

• CREATE your dream love life in Paris by meeting and dating your crushes. Decide where the relationship will go next!

• INDULGE your romantic side while wandering through the original City of Love and let yourself be seduced by Paris’ inimitable charm. Will you kiss him or her on the Pont des Arts bridge?  

• REPLAY the story to try out alternative paths and discover, new exclusive souvenirs. 

Whether you are an avid reader of romance novels, a detective fiction enthusiast, a globe-trotter with a sense of adventure, or just a fan of all stories great and small, City of Love: Paris has something unique for you. 

Delight in City of Love’s humorous writing tone and exciting storyline whilst basking in the authenticity of its setting. YOU are the heroine of this interactive drama. Make your own choices: Date him or her? Go buy some clothes or visit the Louvre? Choose drama or romance. Choose to enjoy or to discover. Choose a black bag or a pink pair of shoes. Choose to kiss the sexy blond or the handsome brown. Choose to date, kiss or love. Let your choices shape your own adventure in the City of Love. 

"Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world" 
Voltaire

More info about your interactive drama on:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CityofLoveParis
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/CityOfLoveGame
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cityoflovegame

PLEASE NOTE:
• This game is free to download and free-to-play but some game items may be purchased for real money. You can choose to disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
• This game contains ads. Making any in-game purchase will disable them forever.

• CREATE your dream love life in Paris by meeting and dating your crushes. Decide where the relationship will go next!

• INDULGE your romantic side while wandering through the original City of Love and let yourself be seduced by Paris’ inimitable charm. Will you kiss him or her on the Pont des Arts bridge?

• REPLAY the story to try out alternative paths and discover, new exclusive souvenirs.

Whether you are an avid reader of romance novels, a detective fiction enthusiast, a globe-trotter with a sense of adventure, or just a fan of all stories great and small, City of Love: Paris has something unique for you.

Delight in City of Love’s humorous writing tone and exciting storyline whilst basking in the authenticity of its setting. YOU are the heroine of this interactive drama. Make your own choices: Date him or her? Go buy some clothes or visit the Louvre? Choose drama or romance. Choose to enjoy or to discover. Choose a black bag or a pink pair of shoes. Choose to kiss the sexy blond or the handsome brown. Choose to date, kiss or love. Let your choices shape your own adventure in the City of Love.

"Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world"
Voltaire

More info about your interactive drama on:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CityofLoveParis
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/CityOfLoveGame
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cityoflovegame

PLEASE NOTE:
• This game is free to download and free-to-play but some game items may be purchased for real money. You can choose to disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
• This game contains ads. Making any in-game purchase will disable them forever.
summary: Dive into your interactive drama: romance, mystery and the Parisian lifestyle!
developerAddress:
UBISOFT MOBILE GAMES
38-42 rue Cuvier
93100 Montreuil Sous Bois
FRANCE
recentChanges:
NEW UPDATE:
City of Love: Paris, Season 2 is coming to an end. Solve the mystery surrounding your friend’s accident and rescue Paris from its impending doom...
comments: This game would have been a good one if it weren't for greed. You can only play a quarter of each episode per day as you can only have 5 choices per day. It ruins anticipation, and delays the flow. It just wants to lurk on your money (to which I really dont have lol). This can be a good game for those who have money lol. Story is entertaining as it is like a book but better since it is as if you are writing your own. The graphics and sound also helps with the appeal.

Game cheats! I was supppsed to get bonus 120 energy today for logging in days in row except after a few seconds on game it says I'm at 0. That's not even possible! I should have at least 20 left! So the extra bonus energy is a bold face lie! I also collected my energy yesterday but did NOT use it so I could play longer today. Nope game stole that energy from me today! I couldn't use it. POINTLESS game if you can't even play & it cheats! Don't bother you only get a few seconds a day!

It,s a really good game and I feel like I,m actually in Paris, the animation and the music is awsome but the problem is that the energy takes a lot of time to recover and just like other players are saying I would also like to say that it would have been better if the energy would recover a little faster and woulden,t be used so quick, I hope you all will make the change since I,m not the only one complaining.

When I saw the "I've got a crush on you" I knew I had to try this cheap copy of choices by ubisoft. They also used a smarter tactic and made all of the choices use energy so you can play 5 to 6 choices maximum and get frustrated each time your energy runs out. Just spend your time on pc games, I don't think anyone needs more games behind a paywall. Google has made sure we have enough of that.

I love this app...... Just love every other episode story brought to life and making my own choices makes it so realistic... I play it everywhere its amazing..... Who woulda thought that reading could be so realistic..... Im used to Just putting images in my head but this is a totally different unexplored reading.... I love it😍😍

title: Mental Hospital IV Lite - Horror games.
description:
Are you ready to accept the gift of madness and understand the secrets of the deep? If yes — “Mental Hospital IV” is waiting for you.

★ Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this atmospheric horror game. But no matter what, never play alone in the dark.

Your intellect is thirsty for non standard tasks, and nervous for a “tickle”? Than horror-action “Mental Hospital IV” from AGaming+ will shake you to the core! Cut the lights, connect your headphones. And watch out, because he is the only one to help you to get out of these horror paws!

Our history started a short time afterwards, after the events at Mental Hospital III. The principal character’s mind was haunted with a story that happened in the St. Peter Hospital. Police sat back on its heels, big newspapers kept quiet. And then, one fine day, a stranger called us and said that he could tell everything in details in a face-to-face meeting. And you are going to a specified place... What can be simpler?!.. That is what you thought also. But you will remember till the end of our life about the story, you got involved to. After you had crushed into an orphan home you got to close quarters with its inmates. And realized that what you saw there cannot be described in words, it may be erased from a cassette, but never from your memory.

And it rests with you only, whether you will be able to solve this tangle of chaos and horror.

Seven reasons to download Mental Hospital right now:

→ Many scary monsters and animals.
→ Many available levels to complete.
→ A video camera that allows you to see in the dark.
→ An exciting and unpredictable plot will not leave you indifferent.
→ Stunning graphics for mobile devices.
→ Complete absence of in-game purchases.
→ A perfect horror game: intense gameplay, scary monsters, sudden screamers, as well as a chilling atmosphere.
